meanings.definition: The process of adapting something to modern needs or habits.
meanings.sent1: The modernization of the old factory increased its efficiency.
meanings.sent2: The city underwent modernization with new buildings and technology.
meanings.sent3: The modernization of the outdated computer system brought it back to life.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe modernization was like a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The modernization of the school's curriculum made learning more engaging.

meanings.definition: The act of making something modern in style or character.
meanings.sent1: The modernization of the house included sleek furniture and minimalist decor.
meanings.sent2: The modernization of the logo gave the company a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at modernization of the classic painting raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: The modernization of the play added a new twist to the storyline.
meanings.sent5: The modernization of the kitchen transformed it into a chef's dream.
